unit.name: Alpha Legion Storm Eagle
unit.notes: May transport four infantry units without Mounted; Terminators, Daemon Princes, Chaos Spawn, Big Mutants and Dreadnoughts counts as two units each. Counts as a Chaos Thunderhawk for being transported.
unit.crit: The Storm Eagle and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Chaos Thunderhawk
unit.notes: May transport eight infantry units; Terminators, Daemon Princes, Chaos Spawn, Big Mutants and Dreadnoughts counts as two units each.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Night Lords Thunderhawk
unit.notes: May transport eight infantry units; Terminators, Daemon Princes, Chaos Spawn, Big Mutants and Dreadnoughts counts as two units each.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Alpha Legion Thunderhawk
unit.notes: May transport eight infantry units; Terminators, Daemon Princes, Chaos Spawn, Big Mutants and Dreadnoughts counts as two units each.
unit.crit: The Thunderhawk and all units being carried are destroyed.

unit.name: Chaos Stormbird
unit.notes: May transport twelve infantry units; Chaos Spawn, Terminators and Dreadnoughts count as two units each. Counts as a Thunderhawk for being transported.
unit.crit: The Stormbird and all units being carried are destroyed. All units within 5cm takes a hit.

unit.name: Hellbringer Class Light Cruiser
unit.notes: Transport. May transport 8 infantry units. These may only enter the battlefield by Teleport.

unit.name: Devastation Class Cruiser
unit.notes: Transport. May transport 20 infantry units or Dreadnoughts; plus three Thunderhawks to transport and enough Dreadclaws to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Plagueship
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards)

unit.name: Despoiler Class Battleship
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards)
unit.notes: Transport. May transport 30 infantry units or Dreadnoughts; plus six Thunderhawks and enough Dreadclaws to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Chaos Strike Cruiser
unit.notes: May transport twenty infantry units or Dreadnoughts; plus twenty light vehicles or armoured vehicle units (except Dreadnoughts); plus six Thunderhawks and enough Dreadclaws and Thunderhawk Transporters to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Chaos Drop Pod
unit.notes: May transport one formation of only the following units: Chaos Space Marines, Havocs, Chaos Dreadnoughts. After the Drop Pod lands, its Deathwind attacks all enemy units within 15cm. Each enemy formation attacked receives a Blast Marker for coming under fire, and an extra Blast Marker for each casualty. Then any troops carried in the Drop Pod must disembark within 5cm of the Drop Pod or within 5cm of another unit from the same formation that has already landed, so long as all units are placed within 15cm of the Drop Pod. Drop Pod models should be removed from the board once the formation they transport has disembarked.
